doc.title: 15 Minutes
doc.plot: The irony of all the panic and effort involved in running late for a train that is to be delayed anyway. Finally, upon arrival at the platform, completely spent, catching breath, looking wildly for a train possibly missed, the delay is announced. All that can be done is to sit and contemplate how the universe could be so cruel.
